message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I value it highly, but I'm willing to part with it for $1,500,000. I believe its worth to you will far exceed this price.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $1,500,000 is too high for me. Could we settle on a price closer to $750,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $1,500,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $1,200,000 is still more than I'm comfortable paying.  I could go up to $900,000. Let me know if that works for you.
